text: Else Hagen (21 September 1914 - 17 August 2010) was a Norwegian visual artist. She was born in Eydehavn, and was married to Arne E. Holm. She is known for her large decorations in public areas. Among her works are decorations in Stortinget, Tromsø Airport, the University Library in Bergen, the Norwegian School of Sport Sciences, and Postgirobygget. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People from Arendal Category:Norwegian artists
title: Else Hagen
